document_data.mainbody:
hen was a small orc village, home of the White Hand clan, located in the Vilhon Reach part of the Winterwood.
The village of Shen consisted of approximately 250 orcs of the White Hand clan circa 1370 DR. The settlement stood four miles north of the Wintercloak River and was locked in a conflict with vegepygmies that dwelled south of the river. The war raged in the forest in the late-14 century DR and made it a dangerous travel destination.
